page.title: 18A TYPICAL HOPE & FEARS REPLY
page.content: A resident of Butlers Marston gave in what is the most typical replies to the questionaire.Here are some examples: {What are your hopes for the area?} a)Retention of village life. b)Completion of M40 as soon as possible,but with as little inconvenience to our immediate area as possible. c)Opening of a village public house.. {What are your fears for the area?} a) Closure of village school. b)Looney left ruining country sports. c)Lack of interest/investment by local government. {What are your hopes for the future?} a)Continued Conservative Government. {What are your fears for the future?} a)Nuclear war. b)Return to socialism.
